General.Name: Sugi Holdings Co.Ltd
General.Description: Sugi Holdings Co.,Ltd. operates drugstores in Japan. It also provides business management; self-care support services; and medicine support, home-visit dispensing and nursing, prevention programs, shopping assistance and mobility support services. Sugi Holdings Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in Obu, Japan.

1.Name: Makoto  Kasai
1.Title: Head of Corp. Planning Office, Head of IR Office and GM of IR Dept. & Bus. Planning Dept.

2.Name: Hidehiko  Tsukada
2.Title: Exec. Gen. Mang. of Personnel & Gen. Affairs
